Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Andres
Reviews.Content: Great camera & features. Just what I wanted so I'll give it a 100% as a product & quality. ok

Reviews.Title: Great package, excellent camera!
Reviews.Author: Grandma Jo "Jo"
Reviews.Content: This is a great package with many useful accessories, unlike many that include a tripod(which most already have), a smaller second lens, and smaller SD card.  The awesome red Nikon D3200 is fantastic.  The backpack pictured is not what was sent, but the one I received was of better quality with 5 star ratings on Amazon while the one that was supposed to come only had a 3 star rating.  Everything was very well packaged.  Great Deal!

ProductInfo.Features:
KIT INCLUDES 12 PRODUCTS -- All BRAND NEW Items with all Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties:
<1> Nikon D3200 Digital SLR Camera & 18-55mm G VR DX AF-S Zoom Lens (Red) + <2> Nikon 55-300mm VR DX AF-S Lens + <3> Transcend 32GB Class10 SD Card +
<4> PD DSLR Sling Backpack + <5> Zeikos 52mm Hard Lens Hood + <6> Vivitar 52mm UV Glass Filter +
<7> Vivitar 58mm UV Glass Filter + <8> ML-L3 Shutter Remote Control + <9> PD 6pc Complete Cleaning Kit +
<10> PD Spudz Microfiber Cloth + <11> PD Memory Card Storage Wallet + <12> LCD Monitor Screen Protectors
ProductInfo.Name: Nikon D3200 Digital SLR Camera & 18-55mm G VR DX AF-S Zoom Lens (Red) with 55-300mm VR Lens + 32GB Card + Backpack + Filters + Remote + Accessory Kit
